where.label: WR1
where.expression: (EXISTS(street_number) OR EXISTS(street) OR EXISTS(postal_box) OR EXISTS(town) OR EXISTS(region) OR EXISTS(postal_code) OR EXISTS(country) OR EXISTS(internal_location) OR EXISTS(facsimile_number) OR EXISTS(telephone_number) OR EXISTS(electronic_mail_address) OR EXISTS(telex_number))

entity.name: Unit
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(Amount_of_substance_unit, Electric_current_unit, Length_unit, Luminous_intensity_unit, Mass_unit, Plane_angle_unit, Ratio_unit, Solid_angle_unit, Thermodynamic_temperature_unit, Time_unit)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(dd <* Product_view_definition | (NOT ('PROJECT_MANAGEMENT_RESOURCE_INFORMATION_ARM_CC_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(dd))) AND ('PROJECT_MANAGEMENT_RESOURCE_INFORMATION_ARM_CC_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_VERSION' IN TYPEOF(dd.defined_version)))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(pv <* Product_version | (NOT ('PROJECT_MANAGEMENT_RESOURCE_INFORMATION_ARM_CC_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_VERSION' IN TYPEOF(pv))) AND ('PROJECT_MANAGEMENT_RESOURCE_INFORMATION_ARM_CC_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT' IN TYPEOF(pv.of_product)))) = 0
